subject: Urgent: Update Your Password
body: Dear user, your account has been compromised. Click here to reset your password immediately: http://fake-link.com

subject: Invoice for Last Month
body: Hi, please find attached the invoice for last month's services. Let me know if you have any questions.

subject: Security Alert: Unusual Login Attempt
body: We detected an unusual login attempt on your account from a different location. Verify now: http://malicious-site.com

subject: Meeting Confirmation
body: Hi Team, the meeting is scheduled for tomorrow at 3 PM. Let me know if you need to reschedule.

subject: Your Account Will Be Locked
body: Your email storage is full! Click this link to upgrade and avoid losing emails: http://phishing-website.com

subject: Job Offer from HR
body: Congratulations! You have been selected for a high-paying job. Provide your details here: http://fake-careers.com

subject: Payment Confirmation for Your Order
body: Thank you for your purchase. Your order will be delivered in 3-5 days.

subject: New Policy Update
body: Dear employee, please read the latest policy update from HR in the attached document.

subject: Win a Free iPhone!
body: You are the lucky winner of a free iPhone! Click here to claim your prize: http://scam-link.com

subject: CEO Request: Urgent Payment Needed
body: Hi, I need you to wire $5000 to this account ASAP. This is a confidential request. Do not discuss.
